radiographic_examinations.findings: No pleural effusion; diffuse mild hepatic steatosis with an estimated fat fraction of 9%; small 1 cm cyst in the liver; minimal intrahepatic and extra biliary ductal dilatation up to the ampulla without findings of stricture or focal lesion; gallbladder contains sludge; no choledocholithiasis or significant stricture; pancreas unremarkable; spleen unremarkable; 1.2 x 1.0 cm right adrenal adenoma; few simple renal cysts bilaterally; small to moderate hiatal hernia; no bowel obstruction; no lymphadenopathy in the upper abdomen; no suspicious osseous lesion.
